import round from "../assets/images/round.svg"; import tit from "../assets/images/tin.png"; import icu from "../assets/images/icu.png"; import sf from "../assets/images/sftp.png"; import React from 'react' import Button from "./Button"; const Advertise = () => { return (

Break into tech like a pro, start your journey with us at bpurpleHQ

{/* */}
{}

Swift First Step Programs

This program is targeted for absolute beginners, you will learn the foundational skills and knowledge necessary to build and succeed in the tech, provide you with the confidence you need. Join us and take the first step towards a rewarding career in technology (Scholarships available)
Duration: 3-4 weeks

{ }

Teens In Tech

This program is targeted for young teenagers geting into tech, they will learn the foundational skills and knowledge necessary to build and succeed in the tech, provide you with the confidence you need. Join us and take the first step towards a rewarding career in technology (Scholarships available)
Duration: 3-4 weeks

{}

Incubator Program

This program is designed for juniors and intermediates who want to enhance their skills in technology and stay ahead of the game in this rapidly evolving industry. Whether you're looking to advance in your current career or explore new opportunities, this program can help you achieve your goals.
Duration: 6-10 weeks

) } export default Advertise
